WorkPlace.Name: Xterna A/S
WorkPlace.Description:
Xterna har profiler indenfor flere fagområder. Det er vigtigt for Xterna, at vores kunder får de medarbejdere, der har de bedste kvalifikationer til lige netop den opgave, der søges løst. 
Vi har bemanding inden for, og rekrutterer kvalificeret arbejdskraft til, bygge-, anlæg og industr

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: CNC-operator with milling and turning experience
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Xterna A/S is looking for CNC-operators with milling and turning experience mainly with Mazak. The ideal candidates have a minimum of two years of experience with operating, milling and turning on CNC-machines. Your English level must be at conversational level, as communication is important for your daily tasks.


Work details:

  • 37 hours
  • Work clothes are provided by Xterna A/S
  • Startup: ASAP

Do you have the necessary skills of programming, operating and turning, and are looking for the perfect opportunity for working abroad? Then send in your application to us and start your new adventure in Denmark!

Please mark your application with “CNC-operator – Mazak”.
